Afghanistan: Ahmad Shah Durrani of the Abdali Pashtun confederacy declared the establishment of an independent Afghanistan, with its capital at Kandahar.
Armenia: The Persians establish the Karabakh Khanate.
Cuba: Francisco Antonio Cagigal de la Vega begins a 13-year tenure as Governor of Cuba.
Sweden: Olof von Dalin begins publication of his Swedish history, Svea Rikes Historia
